Growing Up NYC
  • Patterns

Language Switcher

The Language Switcher component allows visitors to choose the language in which they navigate the application. On Growing Up NYC, the list of available languages are defined by using the WordPress plugin, WPML.

Pick a language
  • English
  • Spanish
  • العربية
  • 繁體中文
  • Français
  • 한국어
  • polski
  • Русский
  • اردو
  • Bangla
  • Haitian Creole
Translate

      <span class="text-left pick-a-language" data-js="js-pick-a-language">Pick
        a language</span><button class="button--text close-language-switcher"
        data-js="close-mobile-language-menu"><svg class="icon--small"
          role="img">
          <title>Close</title>
